Posts.Content: Just got my report and I'm confused. It read invasive ductal carcinoma - then it said ductal carcinoma in situ - nuclear grade 2. Does this mean I have 2 types in the same breast or just a ductal in situ that hasn't spread yet ? I sincerely hope someone can clarify this for me.
Posts.Title: newly diagnosed

Posts.Content: I had a core needle biopsy last Monday 9/10/18. My mammo last Thurs with spot compression showed a 5MM lesion that dissipated with compression. This confuses me. Has anyone ever had this happen to them? I am now just waiting for the biopsy report and am so worried.
Posts.Title: waiting and wondering
